title: This is the Northern Illinois PoGo Server

footer.text: If you need help right away tag or DM Lap.

fields.name: My Name is Lap Controller
fields.value: First, I would like to welcome you to the Northern Illinois Pok√©mon Go Discord Server. I assist Lap with running the discord. If you need anything please let me know by just tagging me using @Lap Controller. I hope you enjoy yourself.
